Text:
OK gang I leave this DHT Torrent in your good hands as I will be off the net until March 2010.   Remember you no longer require a tracker to seed on the Pirate Bay, use your built in DHT service and you will all be the tracker, both seeds and peers alike and ensure the future of Bit torrent as the RIAA and others attempt to close the tracking sites down.   Mini Nova being the latest to go down.

Click on the Magnet link to load the DHT direct into your client.   Note you need at least one person in the swarm with DHT switched on to get the magent file.   DHT is the future guys and girls so go use it, learn about it.   Tell everyone the EXTERNAL TRACKER is DEAD, as dead as VHS Video Tape.
